{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR845N |revision=v3.x (EU/US) |series=N300 |asin= |fcc_date=02/07/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR845NV3 |pcb_id=1609272845-3.0,
2050500852 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628N;MT7628NN; |cpu1_cspeed=575 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q32BSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628N;MT7628NN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?model=TL-WR845N Product page] "1609272'''845-3.0'''" and "Rev:1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/TE7WR845NV3/Internal-Photos/TL-WR845N-internal-Photos-3276247.html FCC photos]. {{see also|TP-LINK TL-WR840N v5|Proware}} Per the manual provided by '''TP-LINK''', the default SSID pattern is '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX'''. *[https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=830806&st=40#entry64611760 ''TP-LINK TL-WR845N(EU) Ver:3.0'' on '''4pda''' forums] (RU) :"2050500852" and "1712" is silkscreened on the board. ===See also=== *[[TP-LINK TL-WR845N v1.x]] - ''300Mbps Wireless N Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR845N TE7WR845N] (2016-08-28) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR845N v3.x]] - ''300Mbps Wireless N Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR845NV3 TE7WR845NV3] (2017-02-07) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR902AC v3.x]] - ''AC750 Wi-Fi Travel Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR902ACV3 TE7WR902ACV3] (2017-08-29) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR802N v4.x]] - ''300Mbps Wireless N Nano Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR802NV4 TE7WR802NV4] (2017-05-17) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v6.x]] - ''450Mbps Wireless N Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR940NV6 TE7WR940NV6] (2017-07-07) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR940N v4.x]] - ''450Mbps Wireless N Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR940NV4 TE7WR940NV4] (2016-10-26) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR841N v13.x]] - ''300Mbps Wireless N Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR841NV13 TE7WR841NV13] (2016-12-01) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR841HP v5.x]] - ''300Mbps High Power Wireless N Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR841HPV5 TE7WR841HPV5] (2017-03-30) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR810N v2.x]] - ''300Mbps Wireless N Mini Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR810NV2 TE7WR810NV2] (2016-11-02) *[[TP-LINK TL-WR1043N v5.x]] - ''450Mbps Wireless N Gigabit Router'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7WR1043NV5 TE7WR1043NV5] (2016-11-02)
